GAMEPLAY_BinocularsDescription.English: Old binoculars, that still seem to work quite well.
GAMEPLAY_BinocularsDescription.German: Ein altes Fernglas, das immer noch gut zu funktionieren scheint.
GAMEPLAY_BinocularsDescription.Russian: Старый бинокль, который до сих пор, кажется, работает довольно хорошо.
GAMEPLAY_BinocularsDescription.Turkish: Eski bir dürbün, hala oldukça iyi gibi görünüyor.
GAMEPLAY_BinocularsDescription.Polish: Stara lornetka, nadal działa całkiem dobrze
GAMEPLAY_BinocularsDescription.French (France): De vieilles jumelles, qui semblent encore fonctionner assez bien.
